long_description: The all-stainless-steel construction of the super-lightweight Gerber Ripstop I Serrated Knife is made lighter by the cutouts in the streamlined handle and blade. Serrated blade cuts cord and rope around camp; smooth portion of blade handles all kinds of chores. Frame-lock design has dual thumb studs that make opening the blade a snap. Closing it is a simple 1-handed step. Gerber Ripstop I Serrated Knife has an integrated pocket clip.
short_description: The all-stainless-steel construction of the super-lightweight Gerber Ripstop I Serrated Knife is made lighter by the cutouts in the streamlined handle and blade.
